lead_paragraph: KALLETT--Calvin. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Calvin Kallett, who leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Calvin's beloved wife, Annette; his children, Tricia Kallett (Craig Klosk), Sara Kallett, and Nancy El Naggar; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Jeffrey A. Schoenfeld, President; Robert S. Kapito, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
